tool_description: Analyzes customer price sensitivity and elasticity to optimize recommendation pricing and promotional strategies.

customer_id.description: Customer to analyze price sensitivity for

product_category.description: Specific product category to focus analysis on

analysis_window_days.description: Time window for price sensitivity analysis (30-365)

error_messages: Customer not found: The provided customer_id does not exist.
Invalid product category: The specified category does not exist in the catalog.
Invalid analysis window: analysis_window_days must be between 30 and 365.
Insufficient price data: Not enough pricing variation data for reliable sensitivity analysis.
usage: Provide customer_id and optionally specify product_category and analysis_window_days to analyze customer price sensitivity patterns.

price_sensitivity_score.description: Overall price sensitivity score (0-1, where 1 is highly sensitive)

optimal_discount_range.description: Recommended discount range to maximize conversion

price_elasticity.description: Price elasticity coefficient for the customer
